Body:
if os.path.exists('/tmp/tune_lc_shape.txt'):
    os.remove('/tmp/tune_lc_shape.txt')
sys.argv = ['lcc', 'prepare_query', '-o', 'tune_lc_shape.txt', '-p',
    'CurvesShapeDescr:alphabet_size', '-r', '5:19:3',
    '-pCurvesShapeDescr:days_per_bin', '-r', '30:120:40', '-p',
    'QDADec:threshold', '-r', '0.1:0.99:0.08', '-f', '/tmp']
config = mock.Mock()
config.TUN_PARAMS = '/tmp'
config.QUERIES = '/tmp'
prepare_query(config)
assert os.path.exists('/tmp/tune_lc_shape.txt')
